review: I've had this for a week and so far I love it.Pros:-Plex App-BYU TV App-Parental controls. You can have separate accounts for each kid (FreeTime) with time limits and no in-app purchasing.-It seems that a lot of the Amazon Prime music songs have lyrics automatically show up which my kids love since they like to sing along.-Really cool HD landscapes for screen saver. This might seem silly but I like the variety of scree saver images that it shows.Cons:-No volume control-FreeTime Unlimited subscription provides a lot of content but I don't see why I have to pay extra since I already have access on Prime to the same content. I would like a way to be able to Mark Prime Shows that the kids could then access. Also, the FeeTime content is not well organized. For example, different seasons of Wild Kratts show up on different pages (you have to scroll a lot) instead of being able to select the season you want from on location like you can in a web browser.After trying FreeTime Unlimited for like a day or so I just unsubscribed since it was useless for me.
